modName: Brelyna Maryon - Just a vanilla change - Potential Spouse
summary: There\'s a lot of vanilla potential spouses for the Dragonborne, wich we just don\'t pay attention. These girls usually got a better background history than the others, like Brelyna, but we run to get Ysolda because she\'s more attractive than others. Well, here\'s a change to Brelyna, so you can see another option besides Ysolda, Mjoll, or Muiri..
descriptionHtml:
[i][color=olive]Hi all! This is my third mod, I\'m just changing a little bit all the potential spouses in Skyrim so [b]we dont put the attractiveness before the personality[/b]. I know, I marry Ysolda, Mjoll, Muiri, even Grelka, in every game I played because they result the most attractive to me. But [u]there\'s A LOT of woman besides them, and usually [b]they got a better personality[/b][/u], a better background history.[/i][/color]

Like [b]Brelyna Maryon[/b]. She\'s a mage at the College of Winterhold (Colegio de Hibernalia), and can be a follower or even a spouse for the Dovakhiin. [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Brelyna_Maryon]Here[/url]\'s the lore for her, so you can get an overview.

For me, she got a better history than other women in Skyrim.


Im using the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812]Better Females by Bella[/url] mod, but [b]this is [u]just a vanilla change[/b][/u]. If you have got another texture\'s for woman (or if you just have the vanilla version), [u]its [b]NOT[/b] a problem[/u]. Probabbly you should get a less smooth skin, but the face change should be there. Anyways, I really recommend the mod.


[i]If you like it, you may try my other vanilla changes:[/i]

[b]Dravynea the Stoneweaver[/b]: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24694]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24694[/url]

[b]Avrusa Sarethi[/b]: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24500]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24500[/url]

[b]Borgakh the Steel Heart[/b]: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24418]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24418[/url]

[b]Ysolda[/b]: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24413]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24413[/url]

[b]Lydia[/b]: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24661]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24661[/url]

Hope you enjoy it!
author: ArouetX
